page.title: 08LOCHGOILHEAD-LIFESTYLES(1)
page.content: Lochgoilhead is located in Argyll, mid-way between Oban on the west coast and Glasgow in Central Scotland. It is ideally situated either as a holiday retreat or a commuter base. The village residential status has developed into three main population categories-{Local Residents,Permanent {Residents-Incomers and Second Home - {Weekend Residents. { {Local Residents The people in this category are mainly elderly or retired. They were born and brought up in the village. They are now few in number.
